PROPERTY_LOCATION.NAME: Base Address
PROPERTY_LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: This base address is the base address used by SW to program STM

PROPERTY_LOCATION.NAME: TPIU Base Address
PROPERTY_LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: This base address is the base address used by SW to program STM

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Formatter Control
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for selecting how to stop formatter

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trigger Control
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for selecting how to generate trigger

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Flush Control
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for selecting how to flush trace buffer

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trace Data Source
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select source that generates software message

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Enable SW message sources
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for enabling the four SW message sources

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Message Source 0
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable the first message source

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Message Source 1
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable the second message source

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Message Source 2
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable the third message source

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Message Source 4
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable the fourth message source

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: SW Masters
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select the SW masters

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: SW Masters
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select the SW masters

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: SW Masters
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select the SW masters

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: SW Masters
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select the SW masters

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Enabled CPU(s)
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of defining the enabled CPUs

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Enabled CPU(s)
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of defining the enabled CPUs

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Enable HW Message Sources
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for enabling four HW message sources

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Message Source 0
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable the first message source

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Message Source 1
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable the second message source

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Message Source 2
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable the third message source

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Message Source 3
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable the fourth message source

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: HW Masters
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select the HW masters

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: HW Masters
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select the HW masters

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: HW Masters
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select the HW masters

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: HW Masters
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select the HW masters

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Enable External Trigger
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for enabling the external to start or stop STM

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Start on Ext. Trigger
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Start Detection on an external trigger

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Stop on Ext. Trigger
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Stop Detection on an external trigger

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Configuration for ETB
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for configuring STM trace by using ETB

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: SW C8 Repeat
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of enabling SW channel message after the defined instrumentation accesses

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Master Repeat
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of enabling master message after the defined instrumentation accesses

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: LTS Dividor
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of selecting Local Time Stamp reference clock devide factor

PROPERTY_LOCATION.NAME: CS_STM Base Address
PROPERTY_LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: This base address is the base address used by SW to program STM

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trace Control
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for configuring trace data generation

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Timestamp Enable
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable generating timestamp packets in trace data

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Timestamp Frequency
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Set the timestamp frequency in Hz

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Sync Mode
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select the mode for synchronization counter setting

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Counter Value (1-4095)
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Set the period in bytes for generating sync packets

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Factor Value (12-27)
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Set the factor for power of two bytes period for generating sync packets

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Port Enable
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable the stimulus ports for generating SW message

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trigger Control
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for configuring trace trigger generation

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trigger Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option to select generating trigger event for every detected trigger or the first detected trigger

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: ATB Trigger Enable
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable generating ATID when software writes to the TRIG location

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trigger Enable
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable the stimulus ports for generating trigger

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: CS_TF_DEBUGSS Address
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The address of trace funnel to select STM data input

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: CS_STM Port Number
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The port number for the first (MIPI) input

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: CT_STM Port Number
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The port number for the second (CS_STM) input

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: CT_STM Trace ID Name
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The Trace ID Name used for getting the ID from device database

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: CS_STM Trace ID Name
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The Trace ID Name used for getting the ID from device database

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: CT_STP Version Name
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The STP version name used for getting version number from device database

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: CS_STP Version Name
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The STP version name used for getting version number from device database

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Stop After Trigger Event
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Stop the formatter after a trigger event is observed

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Stop After Flush
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Stop the formatter after a flush completes

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Continuous Formatting
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Do not embed triggers into the formatted stream

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Sync Counter
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: 12 bit counter value to indicate the number of complete frames between full synchronization packets

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Trigger on Flush
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Indicates a trigger on flush completion

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Trigger on Event
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Indicates a trigger on a trigger event

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Trigger on TRIGIN
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Indicates a trigger on TRIGIN input signal

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Trigger Delay
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Delay Input Trigger generation by a defined number of words

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Delay Counter
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Trigger delayed after sending out defined words
